reviews.review_msg: Worst professor ever. His job is to torture his students and make your life miserable. Majority of the class barely passed and I was just at the edge of the cliff and I failed - and now I have to waste another $3K to retake this class. BTW, he will NOT let you retake his class because all his questions are the exact same format.

Mark is a terrible teacher. His marking is completely subjective and difficult projects, lectures are boring, he has unrealistic expectations and treats adult students like teenagers with loads of projects and strict marking. He is knowledgeable and teaches from real life economic situations, only good, too bad does not know how to teach!

Mark is just brilliant. He puts in a lot of effort, teaches very well, is always available to help and makes even economics relevant to real life.  He does have very high standards, and expects you to   apply principles and provide rational reasoning, but he also teaches all the tools. Great course.
